title: YouTube & Rumble View Bot (Crawlee Version)
description: Boost views on YouTube and Rumble videos using residential proxies with country selection.

videoUrls.title: Video URLs
videoUrls.description: REQUIRED: List of YouTube or Rumble video URLs to view. Other customization arrays below must match this list by order if used.

watchTypes.title: Watch Types
watchTypes.description: How to reach each corresponding video. If shorter than 'Video URLs', remaining videos use 'direct'. Options: direct, referer, search.

refererUrls.title: Referer URLs (for 'referer' type)
refererUrls.description: Corresponding Referer URL if 'Watch Type' is 'referer'. Ignored otherwise.

searchKeywordsForEachVideo.title: Search Keywords (for 'search' type)
searchKeywordsForEachVideo.description: For each video where 'Watch Type' is 'search'. Each item should be a comma-separated string of keywords. Example: "keyword1, keyword2 for video1", "keyword for video2"

watchTimePercentage.title: Watch Time Percentage
watchTimePercentage.description: Percentage of the video to watch (30-100).

useProxies.title: Use Proxies
useProxies.description: Whether to use Apify Proxy or your own custom proxies.

proxyUrls.title: Custom Proxy URLs
proxyUrls.description: OPTIONAL: Provide your own list of proxy URLs to use instead of Apify Proxy. `Use Proxies` must be checked.

proxyCountry.title: Apify Proxy Country
proxyCountry.description: Country code for Apify residential proxies (e.g., US, GB, DE). Leave empty for 'Any'.

proxyGroups.title: Apify Proxy Groups
proxyGroups.description: Apify proxy groups to use (e.g., RESIDENTIAL).

headless.title: Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browsers without a visible UI. Recommended to keep this enabled on the Apify platform.

concurrency.title: Max Concurrency
concurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent browser instances.

maxSecondsAds.title: Max Seconds for Ads
maxSecondsAds.description: Maximum seconds to watch an ad before attempting to skip.

autoSkipAds.title: Auto Skip Ads
autoSkipAds.description: Automatically skip ads when the skip button becomes available.
